HEADER_SLOGAN: The first duty of the image is to be a feast for the eye
CAROUSEL_SUBTITLE: I capture in a unique style, with creative ideas, when everyone celebrates with you.
WELCOME_IF_YOU_ARE_IN_LOOKING: If you’re looking for a photographer, if you want to have taken photos of yourself or your family, you’re in the right place.
WELCOME_IF_YOU_ANY_QUESTION: In case of any questions or requests you may have, feel free to contact us!
GET_THE_TASTE: Get the taste of pictures shot by me
PORTRAIT_PHOTOS_CONTENT: In our age, quality photography is essential for online appearance, CVs and social networking sites. After all (eventually), it is part of the image that we would like to show about ourselves to the world. If you want to expand your portfolio, profile picture or business portrait with quality photos, contact me with confidence.
FAMILY_PHOTOS_CONTENT: I love watching summer sunsets, listening to the rustling of trees, the chirping of birds, the closeness to nature. The search for perfect lights, different illuminations was always important for me. If you want to enrich your family album – either in a studio or in a natural environment - then it's time to make an appointment.
WEDDING_PHOTOS_CONTENT: Where only you are in the pictures. It’s also a great time to spend some time with me and get to know your photographer before the wedding. If you are not yet practiced in front of the camera, you have the opportunity to learn how to behave naturally during a photo shoot.
CREATIVE_PHOTOS_CONTENT: It is a special thing for me to photograph couples in love regardless it is bridal or creative photography. A photographer who will be with you all day long will watch every move of you and your guests, the events, while he discreetly stays in the background. My goal is that my photos will be able to recall the brightest moments of your life even after many-many years.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_DESC: I take photos of small and large weddings, I try to capture every important moment and give you back as many beautiful moments as possible.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_LI_FIRST: Wedding photography - Duration: approx. It takes 1.5-2 hours for a series of 15-20 developed images.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_LI_SECOND: Preparing at home - Duration: approx. 3 hours.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_LI_THIRD: Creative Photography - Duration: Approx. It takes 3 hours for a series of 30-40 developed images.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_LI_SIXTH: Wedding dinner photography (up to bridal dance) - Duration: approx. 5-7 hours.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_LI_FULL_TIME: The full package includes 17 hours of photography.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_OPT_PACK_LI_FIRST: Wedding photography - Duration: approx. It takes 1.5-2 hours for a series of 15-20 developed images.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_OPT_PACK_LI_SECOND: Preparing at home - Duration: approx. 3 hours.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_OPT_PACK_LI_THIRD: Creative Photography - Duration: Approx. It takes 3 hours for a series of 30-40 elaborate images.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_OPT_PACK_LI_SIXTH: Wedding dinner photography (up to bridal dance) - Duration: approx. 5-7 hours.
WEDDING_PHOTOGRAPHY_OPT_PACK_LI_NINTH: The processed photos will be handed in a gift box engraved on a flash drive.
PORTRAIT_AND_MODEL_PHOTOGRAPHY_LINE_FIRS: 1-1.5 hours of photography, 10-15 developed series of images
PORTRAIT_AND_MODEL_PHOTOGRAPHY_LINE_SECO: Outdoor or studio photography in pre-arranged appointments
CHILD_AND_FAMILY_LINE_FIRST: Outdoor photography: at a pre-arranged location approx. 1-1.5 hours of photography
CHILD_AND_FAMILY_LINE_THIRD: Studio photography: 15-20 developed series of images.
CONTACT_CONTENT: If you liked the sample photos contact me freely. I am ready to answer any questions. According to your needs I can provide quotation both by phone and in e-mail. I hope that you will be my satisfied client soon.
CONTACT_MESSAGE_FILL_OUT: Please fill out the content of message
ABOUT_ME_CONTENT_FIRST: Afotózás az életem része, kitölti mindennapjaimat és ez az ami igazán boldoggá tesz, azt csinálhatom amit igazán szeretek. Nagypapám szerettette meg velem a fotózást, sokszor magával vitt és csodájára jártam, hogy milyen sok embernek tetszik amit ő csinál. Ez volt az a fordulópont, amikor elhatároztam, hogy én is ezt szeretném csinálni és ennek lassan már 20 éve.
ABOUT_ME_CONTENT_SECOND: Először csak hobby szinten csináltam és egyre jobban bele merültem a fotóművészet világába, ma már el sem tudnám képzelni nélküle az életem.
ABOUT_ME_CONTENT_THIRD: Fotóművészeti képzések sora vette kezdetét, ahol nem csak a fényképezőgép helyes tartását, beállításait tanították meg, hanem a látásmódomat is tudtam fejleszteni, ami ebben az ágazatban majdnem, hogy a legfontosabb dolog. Mai napig fejlesztem magam, mint technikailag, mint trendben, hisz évről évre változnak a divatok. Számomra nincs annál nagyobb öröm, mikor pozitív visszajelzést kapok. Fő profilom a portfólió készítés, jegyes fotózás, családi fotózás, eseményfotózás. Felszerelésem a Nikon márkájú professzionális termékcsaládból származik.
ABOUT_ME_ANSEL_ADAMS: Minden fényképen mindig van két ember. A fényképész és a néző.
ABOUT_ME_WRITE_ME: Amennyiben képeink elnyerték tetszésedet, keress engem bátran, szívesen válaszolok bármilyen felmerülő kérdésre.
